• Taylor is upset about Phoebe's death and is comforted by Stephanie. Taylor mentions that Steffy has been leaving her notes and checking on her.
• Stephanie expresses her concern to Taylor about Steffy's emotional state and her involvement with Rick.
• Steffy is upset that Stephanie knows about her relationship with Rick. Rick tries to calm her down and convince her that Stephanie won't tell her father.
• Steffy suggests that they talk to her mother, Taylor, about the situation.
• Taylor is shocked and upset to learn about Steffy's relationship with Rick.

• The group is preparing for Zende and Nicole's wedding. Zende's parents, Kristen and Tony, have arrived, as well as Nicole's father, Julius.
• Pam and Charlie are handling the catering, while Sally and Shirley are trying to find a way to get into the wedding. Shirley has baked some cakes to give out to people.
• Julius is emotional about his daughter getting married and is proud of the man she has chosen. Eric, Quinn, and Ridge are also present and making small talk.
• Sasha has shown up to the wedding uninvited, but Zende assures her that she is welcome as Nicole's sister. Nicole is getting ready with her mother and Steffy.
• The wedding ceremony begins with Carter officiating. Nicole walks down the aisle with her father, and Zende is visibly nervous.

• Wyatt proposes to Sally that they should bring back Spectra Fashions, which was his father's idea as a condition for Wyatt to return to Spencer Publications.
• Donna asks Katie if she still has feelings for Bill, to which Katie avoids answering directly. Bill checks in on Katie and Will after hearing about Thorne leaving them.
• Justin asks Donna about Katie and Bill's situation, and Donna brings up the possibility of Katie getting back together with Bill.
• Wyatt expresses his love and support for Sally, and Sally expresses her love for Wyatt, believing that her future will be incredible as long as Wyatt is in it.

• The group of characters, including Brooke, Ridge, Katie, and Bill, are having dinner together and discussing their personal lives and relationships.
• Hope and Liam are also present and are talking about their own relationship, expressing frustration about the six-month waiting period before they can get divorced from their respective partners.
• Rick and Steffy are also mentioned as they are trying to get an annulment, with Liam expressing concern about Rick using Steffy to get her to sign the annulment papers.

<summary>

- Nick asks Storm to be his attorney to handle custody of his son Jack.
- Taylor has been drinking again, and Nick is concerned about her being alone with Jack.
- Taylor has brought Jack to Rick's house, and he is concerned about her ability to care for him.
- Phoebe is worried about her mother's mental state after the birth of Jack and Ridge assures her she will be okay.
- Nick confides in Storm about Taylor's drinking and instability, and they plan to file for an emergency custody hearing.
- Taylor wants to prove herself to Nick and asks Rick to check her house for alcohol.
- Felicia wants to plan an anniversary party for Ridge and Brooke's parents to keep them from leaving together.
- Storm has arranged for the emergency petition to be heard the next morning, and the process servers are on their way to Taylor's.
- Nick is worried about the custody battle and its impact on Taylor, and Brooke reassures him he is doing the right thing.
- Taylor is served with the summons and is devastated that Nick is trying to take Jack away from her.

</summary>

<summary>

* Thomas is planning to marry Zoe quickly, causing Douglas to be upset. Hope is worried about Douglas and is not ready for the marriage.
* Thomas wants to honor Douglas' wishes, but he also wants to get married to Zoe as soon as possible. He believes that Douglas will forget why he was upset after the marriage.
* Steffy is concerned about Thomas's quickie wedding and thinks that Thomas is not over his feelings for Hope. She believes that Thomas is still hoping that Hope will wear the wedding gown to marry him.
* Liam thinks that Thomas is manipulating everyone to get Hope in an emotional state where she will marry him. He warns Hope not to let Thomas get away with it.

</summary>

• Ridge and Rick discuss their business deal regarding a corner store in a changing neighborhood. Ridge wants to buy it for a boutique, while Rick is hesitant due to the long-time owners having to sell. Ridge accuses Rick of being disingenuous, similar to how Rick felt when Ridge manipulated him into leaving the house.

 • Caroline goes into labor and Ridge leaves the office to be with her. Thomas is present and helps time her contractions. Eric and Rick discuss the situation, with Rick expressing his frustration with Ridge's controlling behavior and Eric defending his son. Rick also accuses Eric of siding with Ridge and not accepting Maya due to her being transgender.

1. Steffy and Liam are preparing to leave for their wedding in Australia, but Steffy wants to finish packing first.
2. Eric and Quinn are also going to the wedding, and Eric takes care of the tickets and passports.
3. R.J. decides to stay behind to take care of things at home and spend time with his new friend, Coco Spectra.
4. Thomas invites Sally to his sister's wedding in Australia as his date, but she can't go.
5. Shirley and Saul warn Sally against chasing after Thomas, but Sally decides to book a last-minute flight to Sydney.
6. Ridge and Brooke are on the same flight to Australia for Steffy's wedding, and Brooke is excited to marry Ridge.
7. Nicole reveals to Maya that she knows Maya is really her brother, Myron, and Steffy confronts Quinn about her actions towards her family.

* Brooke and Bill are at the hospital, where Katie's test results show no change and her white count is still high.
<summary>
  * Liam and Hope are at Katie's house with her son, Will. Taylor arrives for a follow-up session with Katie.
  * Donna confronts Brooke and Bill about Katie's episode and heart failure, suspecting they are responsible.
  * Brooke and Bill explain that Katie saw them together at Brooke's house after an accident, leading her to believe the marriage was over.
  * Donna realizes Katie must have walked in on something, but Brooke and Bill deny any wrongdoing.
  * Hope, Liam, and Taylor discover Katie is not at the house and try to figure out where she might have gone.
  * Brooke reveals that Katie is at the hospital, not well, and Hope and Liam rush to be with her.
  * Donna questions Brooke, Bill, and Katie about the events leading up to Katie's episode, and Brooke explains the car accident and hiding Bill at her house.
  * Donna expresses concern about the consequences if the police find out about the accident and Bill's involvement.
  * Taylor, a therapist, is at Katie's house when Hope calls about her condition and later questions Brooke about what happened.
</summary>

  * Katie is in heart failure due to myocarditis, an inflammation of the heart muscle, which could be caused by an infection or missed medication.
  * Taylor, Katie's therapist, suspects her stress and distraction from Bill and Brooke's relationship may have contributed to her missing medication.
  * Bill has a bump on his head, which Taylor notices and questions, but he dismisses it as an unrelated incident.
  * Taylor is determined to find out the truth about what happened to cause Katie's heart failure.

• Liam and Bill discuss their new roles as married men and fathers, with Liam seeking advice from Bill about parenting. 

• Steffy and Hope have a tense conversation, with Hope expressing her anger and sadness about the situation but also expressing hope for the future and a desire to move past her negative feelings.

- Beth is struggling with memory problems and thinks it might be early signs of dementia. Her daughters, Brooke and Katie, are making appointments with neurologists to find out.
* Donna suggests recreating happy family memories to help Beth remember. They plan to make a list of "Ways to bring Mom's memories back."
- Beth has decided to return to Paris, despite her family's objections. She wants to leave them with positive memories and is worried about becoming a burden.
* Stephen tries to convince Beth to stay, but she is firm in her decision.
- Marcus, Donna's son, is getting used to being part of the Forrester family. He is working in shipping and is determined to continue working hard.
* Rick, who is also a Forrester, is surprised to learn about Marcus. They are cousins and Marcus explains that Donna asked him to keep it a secret because Ridge has it in for her.
* Steffy, Rick's sister, is worried about how their father will react to Marcus. She warns Steffy that he won't accept Donna's son any more than he did Rick and her.
* Beth explains to her daughters that she wants to be remembered for the woman she was, not the woman she's becoming. She is afraid and frustrated about what's happening to her and doesn't want to depend on others. Katie, who went through a similar experience after a transplant, urges her mother to choose to live and not push people away.

1. * Brooke and Nick are stuck on Nick's boat due to fog, and Brooke asks Rick to watch her baby until she returns.
2. * Macy and Deacon are also on the boat, and Deacon proposes to Macy, who is hesitant due to their short time together and her recent divorce.
3. * Rick confronts Sally about Deacon and Macy's relationship, and Sally defends Macy's right to make her own decisions.
4. * Brooke and Nick share a meal and discuss their past relationships and future goals, including Nick's desire to have five daughters.
5. * Macy expresses her concerns about getting married again so soon, but Deacon assures her that they are in love and should take the next step.
6. * Nick and Brooke discuss their shared feeling of being lost and their devotion to their respective careers, and Nick assures Brooke that he is not just a "speed bump" on her way back to Forrester.

1. * Brooke has decided to resign as the spokeswoman for her clothing line, Brooke's bedroom, and wants her sister Donna to replace her.
2. * Donna is unsure if she can fill her sister's shoes, but Brooke believes in her and promises to teach her.
3. * Ridge is upset about Brooke's decision and is unsure about Donna's ability to model.
4. * Ridge has also decided to stop designing for the Brooke's bedroom line as he finds it difficult to do so without Brooke.
5. * Donna is aware of the impact Ridge has had on Brooke's life and believes that their love story is not over.
6. * Donna is determined to make her mark on the runway and hopes to do so with Ridge's designs.
7. * Ridge initially declines but later agrees to design the line for Donna.
8. * Donna is grateful for Ridge's support and wants to be there for him in any way she can.
9. * In a separate scene, Bridget and Dante discuss a negative pregnancy test result.
10. * Bridget expresses her desire to focus on her relationship with Dante before starting a family, while Dante is disappointed.

• The Forrester family is discussing the future of Thorne and Ridge in the family business, Forrester Creations. Thorne is being removed from the company due to his inability to work well with Ridge, who is set to take over the company.

• Felicia is asked to talk to Thomas about a mystery girl he has been seeing, but she is reluctant to spy on her nephew. Eric announces that Thorne will not be leaving Forrester Creations, and instead Ridge will be removed from the company.

- Donna's wedding to Thorne is interrupted when Thorne realizes that Donna's intentions are not genuine and she is using him to get back at Stephanie.
- Thorne's mother, Stephanie, is happy that the wedding did not happen, while Donna is devastated and vows to get her revenge on Stephanie someday.

• Thorne asks a man to remove Donna from the Forrester property after finding her in a bedroom with another man.
• Donna's husband, Eric, has recently come out of a coma and is now in a wheelchair. The family is concerned about his health and has sent Donna away.
• Dr. Patrick informs the family that Eric will need therapy to regain his physical strength and that they should give him love and support during his recovery.
• Taylor is having trouble putting her baby, Jack, to sleep and is upset that Brooke's mother, Taylor's mother-in-law, is trying to help.
• Donna tells Brooke that she and her assistant, Owen, were in a guest room together when Eric came in and saw them. Eric misunderstood the situation and is now refusing to see Donna.
• The family has hired guards to keep Donna away from Eric and has made it clear that they do not want her to see him.
• Donna is determined to see Eric and is considering telling him her side of the story. She is upset that Stephanie is trying to manipulate Eric and turn him against her.

• Deacon tries to reconcile with Hope and apologizes for not being there on her wedding day. He also mentions that he knows about her marriage not working out with Liam.
• Hope explains to Deacon that Liam found the note she left for him, thinking she was the one who wrote it, which led him to Steffy.
• Deacon and Hope discuss the strong feelings Liam and Steffy have for each other, with Hope mentioning that she still loves Liam but can't be with him because of those feelings.
• Deacon encourages Hope to not give up on Liam, saying that she still loves him and that things between them are not over.

�bullet Eric and Stephanie express their love and pride for Thorne, and offer him a gift of a collection to sell under his name at Spectra Couture.
�bullet Caitlin informs Stephanie about Amber working at Insomnia, a place Thomas frequents, and Stephanie suspects Amber is trying to see Thomas despite the restraining order.
�bullet Ridge leaves town for work, and Thomas and Amber plan to spend time together while he is gone. Stephanie confronts Amber about being with Thomas at Insomnia.

<summary>

- Bill advises Liam to call off his engagement to Hope, as he believes their relationship is not a true marriage.
* Liam and Hope's friends and family are at a bachelor party for Liam, but he seems distant and out of it.
* Steffy continues to pursue Liam, believing that Hope does not appreciate him and that he will eventually leave Hope for her.
* Hope has broken a promise to Liam regarding their wedding date, but she plans to explain everything to him and reassure him of her commitment.
* Ridge and Brooke discuss Liam and Hope's relationship, with Brooke expressing concern about Hope's broken promise and Ridge defending Hope's decision to tell Liam in person.
* Justin and Bill discuss Liam's bachelor party and Bill's stance on Hope, with Bill revealing that he asked Steffy to drive Liam home and end the engagement.
* Rick tries to get information about Liam and Steffy from Marcus, who knows nothing.
* Steffy drives Liam home and they discuss his relationship with Hope, with Liam expressing his love for Hope and his plan to work through their issues.
* Steffy offers to spend the night with Liam, but he declines.
* The scene ends with Steffy asking if she can give Liam a friendly kiss, and he sighs before the text cuts off.

</summary>

• Nick and Bridget discuss telling Brooke about Bridget's pregnancy, which could potentially end Nick's marriage to Brooke.
• Taylor, Hector, and Stephanie discuss Shane McGrath, a homeless man who knows that Taylor killed Darla, and who is now living with Taylor.
• Phoebe and Shane discuss their relationship, with Shane expressing his desire to be a part of Phoebe's life and Phoebe expressing her desire to be free and independent.
• Taylor, Hector, and Stephanie continue to discuss Shane, with Hector revealing that Shane has a restraining order against him and a history of theft.
• Stephanie meets Shane and they discuss his intentions, while Taylor takes Hector to a doctor's appointment.
• Nick tells Brooke that he has something to tell her, and that it could be a blessing or a curse, depending on how she chooses to look at it.

• Brooke, Hope, Donna, and Ridge are shocked to learn that Flo donated her kidney to Katie.
<summary>

• Wyatt, Sally, and Douglas are at the cabin taking care of Beth while Hope and Liam are at the hospital with Katie. They are discussing diaper supplies and a list of instructions that Hope left for them.

• Shauna explains to Brooke, Hope, and Donna that Flo wanted to help Katie and donated her kidney secretly, hoping that all would be forgiven.

• Katie and Flo express their feelings about the kidney donation, with Flo stating that she did it for her father as well, to make him proud.

• Wyatt tells Sally that he needs to put a ring on her finger to show his commitment and to ensure that she knows he is not thinking about Flo.

• Donna suggests that they should thank Flo for donating her kidney to Katie, despite her past actions.

• Brooke, Hope, and Katie express their gratitude for the kidney donation but emphasize that it does not erase what Flo did to Beth and hope.

• Katie tells Flo that she is grateful for her, and Flo's father would be proud of her.

• Brooke tells Shauna to stay away from her, her sisters, and her husband, emphasizing that Flo is not back in the family no matter how many organs she donates.

• Quinn Forrester is concerned about her son Wyatt's relationship with Katie Logan and gets into a physical altercation with Katie.
• Eric Forrester, Quinn's husband, is disappointed in Quinn's behavior and gets into an argument with her.
• Sheila Carter, a former enemy of the Forrester family, is now working as a waitress near Forrester Creations and tries to convince Pamela Douglas, another family member, that she has changed for the better.

1. Ridge helped Will, Bill's son, by using his favor with a judge to ensure Will could see Bill more often. Thorne approves of Ridge's actions and is grateful that Bill is no longer a major part of their lives.
2. Bill has been pursuing Brooke, and Ridge is upset about it. Steffy walked in on Bill kissing Brooke, and Ridge has told Brooke she cannot be near Bill again.
3. Pam and Charlie are getting married, and they are discussing wedding plans with Eric and Quinn. Pam wants to get married in Eric's living room, under Stephanie's portrait.
4. Thorne is upset about Bill's behavior and is worried about how it will affect Katie. Ridge is also concerned about Bill's continued presence in their lives and is determined to protect his wife and family.
5. Bill is grateful to Brooke for helping him with Will and is still pursuing Brooke, despite her marriage to Ridge. Ridge is upset about this and is trying to figure out how to end the situation.
6. Brooke assures Ridge that she only cares about him and that Bill cannot get to them. She tells Ridge to stop talking about ending things violently and to remember that he is a kind and gentle person.

• Jake, a pilot, informs Massimo that there has been a delay and they have clearance to leave Puerto Vista as soon as the others arrive.
• Nick is worried about Brooke and tries to call her cell phone.
• Massimo reassures Nick that Brooke needs time alone to grieve for her late husband.
• Sally is upset about stores advertising their pre-Thanksgiving sales before Halloween.
• Ty and Oscar discuss a rush job and radio spots for their company.
• Amber is upset that Deacon asked her to leave his home and not see her son.
• Bridget and Amber argue over what is best for Eric, Deacon's son.
• Ridge, who was previously thought to be dead, returns and reunites with his family.
• Ridge thanks Nick for taking care of Brooke when he was gone and Nick offers to loan him money.
• Stephanie, Ridge's mother, arrives at the airport and is reunited with her son.

• Rick, president of a fashion company, is not happy with a dress design by Caroline and Ridge.
• Hope, in a conversation with Wyatt and Deacon, expresses her concern about Deacon's relationship with Quinn, who she believes is manipulating him to get close to her baby.
• Deacon and Quinn discuss Hope's demand that Deacon choose between her and Quinn, with Deacon expressing his suspicion that Quinn might be using him.
• Maya accuses Rick of being oblivious to Caroline's alleged affair with Ridge, which she claims to have witnessed.
• Hope and Wyatt discuss their parents' relationship, with Hope expressing her hope that Deacon will not choose Quinn over her.
• Quinn forces Deacon to stay with her and experience more of what she has to offer, telling him to choose a safe word.

1. * Bill Spencer is in the hospital after being pushed over a balcony by Ridge Forrester. Ridge is not interested in discussing the incident, but Bill brings it up and accuses Ridge of taking the moral high ground.
2. * Bill tells Ridge that he has decided not to press charges and is trying to practice forgiveness. Ridge accuses Bill of really wanting to get back together with Brooke.
3. * Eric Forrester and Brooke discuss Bill's condition and his intentions to change. Eric is skeptical and thinks Bill is only trying to get closer to his family to win back Brooke.
4. * Pam is upset with Quinn for granting her permission to have her wedding at Eric's house, but acting like it is her own place. Pam wants to repair a portrait of her sister Stephanie that was ruined, and Quinn refuses to let her take it out of the house.
5. * Eric tells Brooke that he thinks she is getting caught in the middle of Ridge and Bill's conflict. Brooke insists that she is not vulnerable to Bill's charms and is only supporting his relationship with their son Will.
6. * Ridge and Bill argue about their track records with women and their personal values. Ridge accuses Bill of being immature and having no boundaries, while Bill mocks Ridge for not being able to commit to a relationship.

1. Thomas enlists Brooke's help to pull off a stunt to promote his new men's line and get the press' attention. Taylor is worried about Thomas feeling overshadowed by Hope's successful line and urges him to make a big statement.
2. Hope checks on Oliver after hearing that he might have been fired, but it turns out he still has his job. Oliver expresses his love for Hope and refuses to give up on them.
3. Thomas introduces his new men's line, which focuses on innovative styles and bold new lines, inspired by Brooke's original concepts. He thanks Brooke for her invaluable input.
4. Hope and Oliver reflect on their past experiences and accomplishments at Forrester, and Oliver expresses his love for Hope and his belief that their lives are tied together.
5. Thomas and Brooke make a surprise appearance on stage, causing the audience to gasp and applaud.

1. Brooke and Ridge are concerned about Thomas' recent behavior and disappearance, while Hope is worried that they will find out she is responsible for his death.
2. Hope reveals to Brooke that she killed Thomas by pushing him into a vat of hydrofluoric acid during an altercation.
3. Brooke tries to convince Hope to keep the secret, stating that there is no evidence pointing to her and that it would be devastating for everyone involved if the truth came out.
4. Ridge tells Steffy that Thomas had suggested a trade of custody for sex, and later asked Hope out for dinner to discuss the adoption papers.
5. Thomas had left Douglas in a dressing room during the dinner and chased Hope around the building after she tried to avoid being alone with him.
6. Hope is torn between her guilt and the potential consequences of confessing, but ultimately decides she needs to tell the truth.
7. Ridge expresses his concerns about Thomas' emotional state and the implications of joint custody with Hope.
8. In a surprising twist, Thomas appears alive, much to Hope's disbelief and relief.

• Stephanie is on her deathbed, surrounded by her loved ones. She reminisces with Brooke, expressing gratitude for their tumultuous relationship and giving Brooke a ring that Stephanie wanted her to have.
• Katie struggles with postpartum depression and fears that she is not a good mother to her newborn son. Taylor consoles her and encourages her to seek help.
• Various characters reflect on their relationships with Stephanie, expressing gratitude, admiration, and in some cases, resentment towards her. Stephanie passes away, leaving her loved ones to mourn her loss.

1. * Stephanie has been shot and is in the hospital after an argument with Donna.
2. * Donna is accused by Stephanie of being the shooter, but she denies it and says Stephanie is confused due to painkillers or blood loss.
3. * Ridge asks Brooke to keep an open mind about the shooting and suspects someone from her family is involved, but Brooke defends her family and criticizes Stephanie for making false accusations.
4. * Eric asks Donna to tell him what happened and wants to know where she was when the gunshot was heard, but Donna insists she didn't do it and saw Stephanie lying there after hearing a noise.
5. * Stephanie wakes up and confirms to Eric that she saw Donna leaning over her when she was found, but Donna insists she's lying.
6. * Donna confronts Stephanie in the hospital and accuses her of having herself shot to win Eric's sympathy, but Stephanie denies it and tells Donna to look for the real culprit.

• Phoebe returns home from her tour and considers moving back in with her mother, Taylor.
• Ridge is happy that Phoebe is back and wants her to stay with them, but Phoebe decides to stay with Brooke.
• Phoebe and Ridge have a heart-to-heart conversation and Phoebe apologizes for not understanding Ridge's protectiveness towards her in the past.
• Phoebe writes a song for Ridge and plans to sing it at his rehearsal dinner.
• Rick refuses to attend Brooke's wedding rehearsal dinner and tells Brooke that he will never support her relationship with Ridge.
• Taylor and Ridge agree to spend time together with their children after the wedding, but Taylor decides not to attend the wedding.
• Brooke and Rick have a heartfelt conversation where Brooke tells Rick that she loves him and is proud of his accomplishments.
• Brooke asks Rick to be there for her on her wedding day, and Rick agrees.

1. Brooke wants to include Jack in her and Ridge's family life, but Ridge is hesitant as he is worried about how Taylor will feel about sharing her child with Brooke.
2. Felicia and Ashley discuss the situation, with Felicia expressing doubt that Brooke will be able to deny her feelings for her own flesh and blood, and Ashley noting that Brooke is willing to avoid Nick to make the situation work.
3. Taylor and Nick discuss her decision to return to work, with Nick expressing surprise that she wouldn't wait and Taylor accusing him of having double standards.
4. Ridge and Brooke discuss the situation further, with Ridge expressing his lack of trust in Brooke being around Nick and Brooke accusing Ridge of sharing intimate details of their life with his former fiancée.
5. Ashley and Felicia continue their discussion, with Ashley noting that Ridge seems more concerned about Brooke than himself and Felicia expressing doubt that Brooke will be able to separate herself from Nick and their son.
6. Brooke and Nick meet in secret and discuss their failed attempts to discuss the situation with Ridge and Taylor. Brooke decides that she needs to let go of Jack for the sake of her and Ridge's future.

• Brooke and Thorne have a conversation about their past relationship and Thorne expresses his desire to be with Brooke again.
<summary>

• Brooke mentions that she has a son with Ridge and that it's not simple to leave him for Thorne.
• Thorne argues that Ridge hurts Brooke and that he should not get her hopes up only to have them crushed again.
• Thorne believes that he and Brooke had a great marriage and can have it again.
• Ivy and Quinn are discussing engagement rings and Simon, a new intern, walks in.
• Quinn asks Simon for his opinion on the engagement rings and Simon ends up proposing to Ivy as a joke.
• Maya and Nicole are discussing their lives and Maya's recent trip to South Africa.
• Nicole mentions that Thorne is back and staying at Brooke's house.
• Simon is from England and Quinn asks for his opinion on the engagement rings.
• Simon prefers the emerald cut ring and Quinn declares that she wins.
• Thorne and Ridge are discussing Thorne's return and Ridge's plan to propose to Brooke.
• Thorne expresses his dislike for Ridge and his attempts to come between Ridge and Brooke.
• Brooke and Thorne are discussing Thorne's feelings for Brooke and Ridge's past actions.
• Thorne advises Brooke to consider her options before committing to Ridge.
• Maya and Nicole are discussing the possibility of Thorne making a play for Brooke.
• Ridge and Quinn are discussing Ridge's plan to propose to Brooke and Quinn's past relationship.
• Thorne is expressing his disbelief that Brooke would consider being with Ridge after his past actions.
• Thorne tells Brooke that she deserves better than Ridge and should consider being with him instead.
</summary>

1. * Nicole is trying to adopt a baby from Mia, who doesn't trust her and wants to meet Nicole's fiancé before giving up her baby. Brady advises Nicole to tell Mia the truth, but Nicole is hesitant and gets into an argument with Brady.
2. * Charlotte and John are discussing his therapy sessions. Charlotte has been able to convince John to proceed with hypnosis to regain his memories.
3. * Chelsea is getting ready for Lucas and Chloe's engagement party, but she doesn't feel like going because she is the only one attending without a date. Max offers to accompany her, but she declines.
4. * Daniel and Kate have ended their relationship, but they have decided to remain friends. Lucas is upset when he finds out and gets into a physical altercation with Daniel, leaving him with a bruised face.

1. * Abigail has been seeing EJ DiMera, which Jennifer, Abigail's mother, disapproves of. Abigail explains that EJ returned a keepsake to her and they started talking, with EJ saying nice things about her late father. Jennifer is suspicious of EJ's motives and warns Abigail to stay away from him.
2. * Kate is confronted by Julie about her possible involvement with Nick Fallon, who has left Salem and is not in contact with his family. Kate denies any knowledge of his whereabouts or actions.
3. * Daniel's computer hard drive crashes, and he suspects that a doctor he was talking to earlier may have planted a virus. Ted, the hospital's IT specialist, tries to recover the data.
4. * Eric's medical records have also been tampered with, and Daniel suspects that the same person is responsible. Eric is trying to prove that he was drugged by the DiMeras.
5. * Anne, a hospital employee, confronts Daniel about pushing her and threatens to file a harassment complaint. Jennifer intervenes on Daniel's behalf and Anne eventually backs down.

1. Melanie is upset because her father is leaving town to take some time for himself due to his hand tremor.
2. Stefano offers to help Chad with his new coffeehouse venture by becoming a silent partner and using his connections to ensure success.
3. Kate and Sami are planning a new youth campaign for Countess Wilhelmina and hope to sign Chad and Gabi as models.
4. Hope is offered a modeling job for Mad World, but she turns it down because she wants to focus on being a cop and a mother.
5. Chad declines Stefano's offer to help with the coffeehouse, wanting to do it on his own.
6. Kate offers Chad and Gabi a modeling contract with Countess Wilhelmina, which they accept.
7. Hope and Bo use a bank employee to lure Stefano to the bank and plan to confront him about the safe deposit box he shares with Hope's grandmother.

• Mimi reveals to Rex that she had an abortion months ago without telling him because she didn't want to ruin his life. She regrets her decision and is afraid of losing him. Rex forgives her and reaffirms his love for her.

• Belle is struggling with the decision to tell Philip the truth about her feelings for Shawn before he goes to war. Shawn-d encourages her to e-mail Philip and end the marriage, but Jan tries to guilt Belle out of it by reminding her of the consequences it could have for Mimi and Rex.

• Kate and Eugenia are plotting against Sami by planting a horoscope on a website that Sami is addicted to, predicting that a man from her past will destroy her happiness. Kate also hired a private investigator to follow Sami and found out that she loves Lucas very much. Kate plans to use this information to ensure that Lucas has the future he deserves without Sami.

• EJ and Sami discuss the current situation with their company, with Sami being in Chicago to handle a problem with a distributor. EJ wants her to come home, but she insists on handling it herself.
• Nick and Abigail meet up and discuss their past, with Nick apologizing for his actions and stating that he is getting help. He also mentions that he has a lead on a job and wants to spend more time with Abigail.
• JJ talks to his aunt, Kayla, about his upcoming court hearing and his concerns about his mother's forgiveness if he messes up again. Kayla reassures him and tells him that his mother loves him very much.
• Theresa and Brady have a heated conversation about their situations in life, with Theresa expressing her frustration about always receiving lectures from her family and Brady defending his privilege.
• Sami surprises EJ at his office with the news that a deal has been finalized, and they discuss Nick and his attempts to make amends.

• Carly wakes up buried alive and realizes Vivian is responsible.
• Melanie is getting ready for her wedding but is feeling emotional and guilty about asking Maggie to come on her anniversary.
• Chloe reveals to Daniel that she is pregnant with his baby.
• Hope is worried about Vivian's plan to hurt Melanie, but Victor assures her that he has everything under control.
• Nathan and Stephanie are leaving for a vacation, but Maggie decides not to attend Melanie's wedding due to her sadness over Mickey's anniversary.
• Vivian reveals to Carly that she has trapped Melanie in a room and plans to kill her during the wedding ceremony.

1. Max is overwhelmed with work and personal issues, but Abby offers her support and helps him out at the garage. They also discuss their past feelings for each other and how they both had crushes on each other in the past.
2. Chelsea is dealing with the aftermath of her argument with Bo and is feeling unloved and unwanted. Billie and Nick both try to comfort her, but she tells Nick to leave and stay out of her life.
3. Hope tries to convince Bo to give Chelsea another chance and not to turn his back on her. She believes that Chelsea is genuinely trying to change and make amends for her past mistakes.
4. Steve expresses his love for Kayla and his fear of losing her again due to the DiMeras' vendetta against him. E.J. also shows his affection for Stefano.

1. <summary>Lexie and Tek are having an affair, but Lexie feels guilty and wants to end it. She is worried that if her husband, Abe, finds out, it will end their marriage. Tek, on the other hand, wants to be with Lexie and believes that Abe is not capable of giving her the intimacy she needs.</summary>
2. <summary>Mimi is feeling guilty about keeping the secret that Shawn, not Philip, is the father of Belle's baby. She plans to tell Shawn the truth, but her mother, Bonnie, tries to talk her out of it. Meanwhile, Philip overhears Belle and Shawn talking and suspects that Belle wants to tell Shawn something important.</summary>
3. <summary>John and Abe are concerned about a man named Alex North, who has threatened to harm Marlena. John wants to confront Alex, but Abe advises him to use his ISA training and gather evidence to have him arrested instead. Abe is also worried about his failing night vision and feels frustrated that he cannot return to work as a police officer.</summary>
4. <summary>Victor has decided to tell Shawn that he is Claire's father, but Kate and Philip try to talk him out of it. They are worried that it will destroy Philip's life and relationship with Belle and Claire. Meanwhile, Belle wants to tell Shawn the truth about her feelings for Philip, but she hasn't found the right moment yet.</summary>
5. <summary>Marlena and Alex are planning their future together, but Marlena is still upset about her encounter with John. Alex tries to comfort her and put her mind at ease, but she is still worried about John's obsession with her.</summary>

1. Marlena and John have a heated conversation about a bug-sweeping device Marlena has in her purse, which John put there without her knowledge. Marlena is upset that John doesn't trust her, and John insists he did it to protect her from Tony.
2. Rex has a conversation with his former professor, Rolf, who is interested in his scientific work. Rolf reveals that he is the doctor who delivered Rex and his sister Cassie, and that they were the result of an experiment conducted by their grandfather, Stefano Dimera.
3. Kate and Roman have a conversation about their relationship and Kate's past as a sex worker. Kate is worried that Roman will not want her once he knows the truth, but Roman assures her that he loves her for who she is.

1. Chelsea has passed out due to a complication from her surgery, and her family is anxiously waiting for updates from the hospital. Daniel, the doctor, is running tests to determine the cause.
2. Ava, a character with a history of mental instability, has taken Steve, Kayla, Bo, and Hope hostage. She has revealed that she plans to keep them captive for nine months, as she wants Kayla to be a surrogate and carry her baby.

1. Rafe, who was previously thought to have died in an accident, is revealed to have been kept as a prisoner in the DiMera basement. Nicole suspects that EJ and Stefano were involved in Rafe's kidnapping and mind control. She plans to use a DNA report to prove her theory.
2. EJ decides to divorce Nicole for Taylor, stating that he loves Taylor and not Nicole. Taylor is conflicted about her feelings for EJ and the impact of her actions on her sister, Nicole.
3. Stefano wants Chad to work at DiMera Enterprises instead of the hospital. Kate helps Stefano by pretending to have a broken phone and asking Chad for technical assistance, giving Stefano a chance to talk to Chad about his plans.
4. Rafe is hailed as a hero for finding the missing children, Theo and Ciara. Hope and Bo are grateful for Rafe's efforts and hope to maintain a good relationship with him.
5. Chloe warns Nicole about poking around DiMera business and expresses concern for her safety. Nicole realizes her mistake and decides to let go of her suspicions about Rafe.

• Jennifer and Hope discuss the miraculous return of Jack and the impact it will have on Jennifer and Abby.
• Bo and Billie continue to search for Georgia, believing she is alive and in need of their help.

<summary>

- Paul is investigating a charter place to find out if Deimos chartered a plane. The charter place is not far from where Paul is, just off country road L. Paul plans to go to the charter place to get more information.

1. John receives a call from Roman, who is looking for Kate and asks for John's help.

1. * Hope is worried about Ben Weston being around Ciara and wants Marlena to help her convince Ciara that Ben is a danger to her.
2. * Marlena has been working with Ben in therapy and has him in hypnosis where he remembers details of the night of the fire. She believes that with medication and therapy, Ben can lead a productive life.
3. * Abigail is cutting Stefan out of her life and plans to handle the pregnancy and doctor's appointments on her own. She is having a difficult time with Chad accepting the pregnancy.
4. * Lani received copies of her son's death certificate and is emotional about it. Eli tries to comfort her and they both reminisce about their relationship and the baby they lost.

• Marlena is officiating a wedding, but Sami interrupts to stop the ceremony, claiming that the bride is trying to kill someone.
• Sami is hysterical and warns that the bride, who she claims is not who she appears to be, will kill Marlena if they are pronounced husband and wife.
• The bride is revealed to be Kristen DiMera, who was believed to be dead. She has taken hostages at the wedding and threatens to kill Marlena.
• Will experiences a series of memories from his past, including his wedding to Sonny, his relationship with his parents, and his love for his daughter.

• Eric tries to intervene and take the gun from Sami, but Kristen urges her to shoot Marlena.

1. JJ has been covering for Kyle with the police, but his mother Jennifer is skeptical that Paige still loves him.

3. Eve overhears JJ making a phone call and confronts Kyle about his illegal activities, revealing that JJ is working with the cops.

• JJ has been shot and is at the hospital with a collapsed lung and severe blood loss.

• Sheila apologizes to Abe for not informing him about her food poisoning and Abe tells her to get his extra pair of shoes from his office after taking the soiled ones to the shoe repair shop.

 • Theo becomes suspicious of Valerie, whom Abe is having dinner with, and believes she is lying about something. Theo wants to investigate, but Claire suggests they first gather more information online about Valerie's past.

1. Luke Spencer is visited by an old friend, Ernesto, who has brought him a gift to help him recover from his recent health scare. Lulu and Tracy are suspicious of Ernesto's motives and question Luke about his relationship with him.
2. Diane Miller is excited to have been nominated for "Litigator of the Year" and is trying to find the perfect dress to wear to the awards dinner. She gets help from Maxie Jones, who works at a high-end clothing boutique.
3. Jason Morgan and Carly Corinthos are concerned about Sonny Corinthos, who has been arrested for simple assault in New York City. They are worried about his safety and his mental state, as he has a history of getting into trouble when he is locked up.

• Sonny discovers that Detective Dominic Pirelli, who he was about to shoot, is actually his son, Dante Falconeri.
• Dante is taken to the hospital in critical condition after being shot in the chest.
• Sonny calls in his friends, Robin and Patrick, to help save his son's life.
• Olivia tells Dante that she is proud of him and encourages him to live his life to the fullest, despite the mistakes she has made in the past.

1. Jason is discussing a possible deal with Claudia Zacchara regarding Sonny's missing son and the shooting of Kate Howard. Claudia denies knowing anything about these incidents.
2. Sonny has Johnny captive and is holding him in an abandoned psychiatric clinic in the mountains. Sonny believes Trevor is responsible for his son's disappearance.
3. Lulu is upset because Johnny didn't show up for their date. Scott Baldwin threatens to have Lulu arrested for attempted murder of his son, Logan.
4. Diego has kidnapped Sam and is holding her captive. He has a liver condition and is taking medication for it. He blames Sam and her family for his father's death.
5. Kate Howard is in the hospital after being shot. She remembers a woman being in her room, but Sonny assures her she won't be bothered again.
6. Nikolas Cassadine has had a blackout and is on his way to Wyndemere. He believes Emily is the key to remembering who killed her.
7. Epiphany Johnson is considering becoming a teacher after surviving a heart attack. She is encouraged by Cassius and Monica Quartermaine.
8. Spinelli and Maxie are trying to decipher a clue left behind by Cooper, Maxie's deceased boyfriend. The clue is "T.M.K." followed by a dash and some letters and numbers.

1. Lucky catches Johnny wearing a Clinton mask and trying to break into Bernie Abrams' office.
2. Carly finds a picture of Franco in Josslyn's christening album and wonders if he's coming after Josslyn.
3. Jason reveals that Franco's message is a reminder that he's watching Jason.
4. Sonny meets with federal prosecutor Claire Walsh, who plans to send him to prison with Dante's help.
5. Carly and Jason discuss how to handle Franco and getting Sonny acquitted.
6. Lucky questions Johnny about breaking into Bernie's office and suspects Sonny is behind it.
7. Diane's office is being renovated, and Alexis is unhappy about sharing the space with her.
8. Sonny and Dante discuss the trial, and Dante reveals that he's not intimidated by Claire.
9. Lucky tries to convince Jason not to retaliate against Johnny, who is causing trouble for Sonny.
10. Luke asks Sonny to keep Ethan out of the mob war and promises to keep Ethan away from Sonny's business.

• Todd Manning is held at gunpoint by his daughter, Starr, after she discovers he killed her boyfriend and daughter.
• Maxie Jones is grieving the loss of her best friend, Robin Scorpio Drake, and feels guilty about not being able to save her.
• Johnny Zacchara tells Kate Howard that he rejected Connie's proposition, but Anthony Jones encourages him to sleep with her to destroy Sonny Corinthos.
• Blair Cramer tells Todd that he will be locked up and the key thrown away, and he responds that she will miss him and always liked him better.

- Sonny's son, Morgan, was killed by a car bomb, and Sonny suspects his sister-in-law, Olivia Jerome, is responsible. Sonny asks Curtis for help finding her.
- Carly, Morgan's mother, is determined to find Olivia and make her pay for her actions. She believes that Olivia should not only be punished for Morgan's death but also for the pain she caused to others, including Ava.

1. Michael is upset that the man who attacked Abby was released on bail, and he feels that the legal system has failed them. Abby has decided to drop the charges against her attacker, but Michael is determined to ensure that the man will never hurt her again.
2. Luke is blaming himself for the death of Jake, even though Elizabeth insists that it was her fault. Luke admits to Elizabeth that he had a few drinks before the accident, but he tells her not to blame herself.
3. Suzanne has surprised Theo by securing the loyalty of some of his key people and taking their grandson to her house. She wants Theo to meet his grandson and raise him together, without Brenda's knowledge.

1. * Carly and Jax are in a custody battle for their daughter Josslyn, with Carly wanting to keep Shawn as Josslyn's guard and Jax wanting to use a security team he trusts.
* Jax has evidence of Shawn's past violent actions and questionable integrity, but Carly believes Shawn would never harm Josslyn.
2. * Kristina reveals to Michael that she has been taking hydrocodone pills given to her by Lisa, but did not know they were not herbal supplements.
* Michael is concerned for Kristina's well-being and tries to take the pills from her, but she refuses and gives them to Ethan instead.

1. * Elizabeth and Hayden get into a physical altercation, and Hayden's estranged mother, Naomi, shows up unexpectedly.
2. * Jason and Sam investigate the possibility that Nikolas faked his own death and framed Jason for his murder.
3. * Nathan confesses to Maxie that he shot Claudette's lover in a jealous rage years ago, causing Maxie to question their relationship.

1. Nikolas ends his relationship with Rebecca due to his continued feelings for her twin sister, Emily.
2. Carly wants to support Michael during his physical therapy sessions, but he wants to go alone to avoid her "policing" him.
3. Olivia and Johnny have a history, and Sonny disapproves of their relationship.
4. The mayor's wife, Andrea, wants to settle a malpractice suit out of court to protect her husband's reputation.
5. Elizabeth suspects Rebecca is cheating on Nikolas with Ethan and asks Lucky to investigate.
6. Monica encourages Nikolas to move on from Emily's death and not use it as an excuse to shut out the world.
7. Olivia seeks Carly's help in dealing with Sonny's disapproval of her relationship with Johnny.
8. Claudia asks Johnny to help her get rid of Jason, who is a threat to her and her unborn baby.

• Georgie is in critical condition after a surgery and Maxie's health is also deteriorating. Monica informs Felicia and Mac that Maxie's blood pressure is low and she is going into renal failure, which could lead to total organ shutdown and death.
• Nikolas and Emily are trying to work through Emily's emotional trauma from being raped. Emily is afraid that she can't be close to Nikolas physically, but Sam advises her to trust the love between them and try to make love with him. Emily takes Sam's advice and tells Nikolas that she wants to make love with him.

1. Patrick struggles to change Jake's diaper, but with Robin's help, he is able to feed the baby.
2. Jax and Carly argue about the possibility of Carly being pregnant, with Carly expressing her fear of being pregnant while Morgan is in a coma.
3. Johnny and Maxie are stuck in an elevator and Maxie tries to convince Johnny to leave Lulu for her.
4. Lulu confronts Maxie about making fun of her mother's condition and Maxie apologizes, acknowledging that Lulu's mother went crazy due to the dangerous situations she faced with Lulu's father.
5. Claudia warns Jason that Sonny may try to take back his business and force Jason to kill him, fulfilling a Greek tragedy-like prophecy.
6. Elizabeth gives Patrick and Robin advice about communicating and being honest with each other before their baby is born.

1. Luke is determined to find Jerry Jacks to get the cure for his polonium 210 poisoning, and Tracy insists on going with him, despite his objections.
2. Lulu reveals to Nikolas and Laura that Stavros forced her to marry him and had Nikolas shot to punish her when she refused to consummate the marriage.
3. Shawn and Alexis have a heated argument about his job as a hitman for Sonny, and Alexis gives him an ultimatum to quit or end their relationship.
4. AJ confesses to Michael that he slept with Carly, and Elizabeth finds out about it, causing a strain in her relationship with AJ.

• Ms. Gilbert, a patient with AIDS, is stable after a surgical procedure where Dr. Drake accidentally pricked himself and was exposed to her blood.
• Dr. Drake is advised to get tested for HIV and Hepatitis B and C, and to start post-exposure prophylaxes (PEP) as a precaution.
• Nikolas thanks Alfred for trying to set him up with his ex-wife Emily, but declines as he doesn't want to impose on her. Alfred brings up the fact that Nikolas' son still needs a mother.
• Colleen, Nikolas' nanny, takes John for a walk in the meadow and invites Nikolas to join them.
• Sam apologizes to Jason for being short with him, and Jason offers to help her study for her G.E.D. test.
• Carly and Sonny discuss Sonny's childhood and the abuse he suffered at the hands of his stepfather. Carly wonders why Sonny's mother, Adela, didn't do more to protect him.
• Lucky is struggling with the fact that he didn't actually kill Manny, Jason did, and feels like a fraud for receiving a medal and a promotion for it.
• Elizabeth finds out that Lucky has been taking pills for his pain, and they have a heart-to-heart conversation.

1. Sam calls Dr. Finn to get her test results regarding a possible malaria infection she may have contracted in Greece.
2. Kevin and Laura receive their test results, which come back negative for malaria.
3. Kristina and Aaron discuss their relationship issues, with Kristina apologizing for being emotionally dishonest about her feelings for her professor, Parker.
4. Alexis visits Julian in prison and asks him to speak to the Bar Association on her behalf to avoid being disbarred.
5. Jordan brings André breakfast at his office as a peace offering and to discuss their relationship.
6. Kristina explains her feelings for Parker to Aaron and how she realized she was attracted to women in a different way than men.
7. Sam finds out she is pregnant and is worried about passing malaria to her unborn child. She asks Elizabeth not to tell Jason until she knows more.
8. Laura and Ava discuss their sons, with Ava reassuring Laura that Nikolas died a hero.
9. Lucy confronts Kevin about his feelings for Laura, giving him her blessing to pursue a relationship with her.
10. Julian is released from prison with the help of his friend Holt, who is working with Ava to help him escape the country.

• Sonny gives Kristina water and reassures Alexis that she will be okay.
• Emily brings a prescription for Spencer and compliments Nikolas on being a good father.
• Lucky asks Nikolas and Emily to take care of Elizabeth and Cameron because he has "screwed up everything."
• Elizabeth goes to Jason's apartment after arguing with Lucky.
• Ric confronts Sam about her argument with Ric.
• Lulu tells Dillon that she is leaving Port Charles.
• Lucky reveals to Nikolas and Emily that Elizabeth found him with Maxie twice.
• Lucky admits to Emily and Nikolas that he is addicted to pain pills.
• Sonny advises Alexis to be honest with Ric about her needs.
• Ric warns Sam that Jason will despise her if she tells him about their one-night stand.

• Molly is getting ready for her freshman orientation at PCU and TJ is stressing out about a cake he promised to get for Sonny and Carly's wedding.
• Sonny and Carly are preparing for their wedding, with Sonny finishing up his vows and Carly receiving flowers from Jason.
• Michael is struggling with the idea of attending his mother's wedding, as Sonny killed his father.
• Morgan is drunk and emotional, blaming himself for his recent mistakes and worrying about his relationship with Kiki.
• Molly and TJ are trying to salvage the cake situation, with Molly determined to fix it and TJ ready to call in a favor to Eckert's.
• Michael and Sabrina are discussing Morgan's struggles, with Michael unsure if he should attend the wedding to support his mother.
• Sonny is talking to Morgan about his behavior, with Morgan worried he may have inherited his father's bipolar disorder.
• Molly and TJ are successful in fixing the cake and TJ suggests Molly stop by her uncle's house for leftovers.
• Michael and Sabrina are expressing their love for each other and contemplating staying in bed all day.
• Sonny is talking to Morgan, reassuring him that he loves him no matter what and encouraging him to take care of himself.

1. Sonny Corinthos has been shot and is being attended to by Jason and a medic. TJ, who was present when Sonny was shot, feels responsible for the incident.
2. Sloane has confessed to Anna that he tampered with the mayoral election and has not turned in Nikolas or ELQ to the authorities, as previously agreed. He now threatens to expose Anna's role in the death of a man in cold blood if she doesn't fix the situation.
3. Hayden and Nikolas share a moment by the pool, where Hayden gets hypothermia and Nikolas wraps her in a warm blanket.
4. Carly is getting ready for her wedding to Sonny, unaware of his shooting. She is surrounded by her loved ones and is excited about the wedding, which she feels will last forever. Jason enters the room, covered in Sonny's blood, causing concern among the guests.

• Danny's father, Sonny, is missing and his family is searching for him.
• Franco has been exonerated of all charges due to his tumor affecting his ability to tell right from wrong.
• Kiki is looking for Franco and Michael offers to give her a ride to the Quartermaines.
• Sabrina delivered Britt's baby and Felix notices that the baby looks nothing like Brad.
• Morgan thanks Michael for his help with their father and Michael emphasizes the importance of family.
• Sonny is grieving over Connie's death and Olivia takes care of him, insisting that he takes his medication.

• Jerry Jacks has taken Alexis Davis hostage and is planning to escape with her on a boat. Sonny Corinthos and Jax are determined to rescue Alexis and stop Jerry.
• Tracy Quartermaine has learned that her father, Edward Quartermaine, is not dead, but Cook, who is like a member of the family, has passed away due to the pathogen in the water.
• Monica Quartermaine informs Tracy that there has been a fatality, and Tracy assumes it is her father. However, Monica clarifies that Cook is the one who has died.
• Patrick Drake has synthesized an antidote for the pathogen using Tracy's blood, but there is only one dose available. Tracy insists that her father should receive it, but Monica explains that she has to follow federal guidelines and distribute it to a doctor who can treat patients.

1. Tracy suggests having grilled salmon for dinner, and Paul agrees.
2. Ava is looking for a flash drive that contains crucial evidence, but it has been stolen. She suspects Ric Lansing is behind it.
3. Patrick's birthday party is held at his house, and he receives various gifts from his loved ones.
4. Dillon's movie production is facing issues due to a new permit law, and Paul offers to help.
5. Carly is worried about Morgan, who has a gun and is looking for Julian Jerome to take revenge.
6. Michael goes after Morgan to stop him from doing anything reckless, while Carly tries to find Morgan as well.
7. Ava and Julian are at a cabin, and Alexis has rented it for them to spend quality time together. However, Julian has to go into hiding due to the shooting incident.

<summary>

- Sonny and Kate's wedding is about to begin, but there are several interruptions and delays.
* Olivia interrupts the ceremony to express her happiness for Kate, but Steve explains that she hasn't been well.
* Milo, one of Sonny's men, also interrupts to wish the couple happiness, but Sonny tells him to save it for the reception.
* Trey comes to the wedding looking for Kristina, who is not there. He and Michael get into an argument about Kristina.
* Joe Jr., Trey's father, takes Kristina hostage and demands a ransom from Sonny.
* Jason calls John McBain about Sam's baby, revealing that there was a mistake with the DNA test results.
* At the wedding, Connie interrupts to reveal that she is already married, to Joe Jr.
* Joe Jr. plans to kill Kristina to get back at Sonny and take over his empire.
</summary>

* Johnny and Claudia discuss Claudia's upcoming marriage to Sonny Corinthos. Claudia reveals that she is going through with the marriage to strengthen Johnny's position in the organization and ensure that he will have a powerful empire to run when he takes over. Johnny expresses his reluctance to take over the family business if it means selling out his sister.
* Elizabeth, Cameron, and Sam arrive at a cabin for a getaway. Sam goes to get firewood and notices that the Russians are outside. She informs Elizabeth, who tries to call Jason but finds that the phone lines have been cut. Sam reveals that there is no cell signal for miles, leaving them on their own.

• Franco has been seen by Max and Milo, who were watching his place all night. He walked into the studio and even waved at Max.

• Michael is out of control after finding out about Claudia's death and almost incriminating himself. Carly wants to reveal the truth to save him.

• Rebecca had a car accident, and Lucky took her statement. She was hurrying to talk to Lucky about Nikolas's strange behavior.

• Johnny is starting a bender because Olivia is in love with Sonny. Coleman advises him to be grateful for what he has.

• Sonny and Carly argue about revealing the truth to the police about Claudia's death. Sonny is worried about Michael's safety.

• Sam is worried about Jason confronting Franco, who is a dangerous artist with a fascination for death.

• Lulu helps Dominic find information about a tagger they think is connected to Claudia's murder.

• Rebecca tells Nikolas she is moving on and is not afraid of him anymore. Ethan supports her and wants to take revenge on Nikolas.

• Maxie is happy that Robin is alive but is still getting used to the idea. She mentions that Spinelli's girlfriend, Ellie, has been offered a job in Portland, Oregon and they are considering moving there with the baby.
• Lulu has lost custody of her and Dante's daughter and blames Dante for it. Carly visits Lulu to ask for her help with Franco, but Lulu is hesitant because she believes Franco is dangerous. Franco confides in Kevin that he killed his mother, Heather Webber, and is seeking help.
• Spinelli and Maxie discuss the possibility of moving to Portland and Maxie insists that it is best for Spinelli and the baby to go. Robin returns home and is reunited with Spinelli and the baby.
• Dante suggests to Lulu that they try to have another baby in order to heal and move on from the loss of their daughter.

1. Alexis and Ric plan to go cut down their Christmas tree, but Ric refuses to go and reschedules his work for the day.
2. Dara, an assistant district attorney, informs Alexis that she has been appointed to defend Manny Ruiz, a man facing criminal charges and recovering from brain surgery.
3. Tracy asks Dillon to move back home and keep an eye on Lulu, who is acting out. Dillon is hesitant but agrees when Emily suggests that Lulu needs support.
4. Carly is upset that she cannot leave Roselawn for Christmas and argues with Dr. Kim about it. She promises to think about staying.
5. Sonny tells Michael that Carly will not be home for Christmas and that they will have to make the best of it. Michael wants to get a special present for his father and Morgan.
6. Alexis visits Manny Ruiz in the hospital and he asks her to defend him, despite his guilt. She is unsure if his criminal behavior was caused by a brain anomaly.
7. Courtney tells Sonny that she will be spending Christmas with Nikolas, and Sonny forbids them from coming to his house. Emily stays with Sonny and the boys to help decorate the Christmas tree.

- Gus discovers he has a son, Rafael, with his ex-girlfriend Natalia. He is 16 years old and a fan of the Chicago Cubs.
* Natalia had kept Rafael's existence a secret from Gus because she didn't want to ruin his happy family with Harley.
* Gus is in shock and needs time to process the news, but he is mostly happy about having a son.
* Alan follows Beth and suspects she has met with her daughter Elizabeth. He is overly protective of Beth and the baby.
* Mel and Rick discuss the custody battle for Rick and Beth's unborn child. Mel warns Rick that Alan will bring up his past mistakes, including his drug dependency and affairs.
* Rick is confident that he can fight Alan and Beth for custody, as he has nothing to hide and Alan has many skeletons in his closet.
* Mel advises Rick that he must be willing to "nail" Beth in the custody battle.
* Natalia goes to the police station to find Rafael, who has been taken to a holding cell.

• Lizzie reveals to Ava that she knows about her visit to a fertility clinic, causing tension between the two.
• Rick cancels the annual Bauer barbecue due to his recent breakup with Beth, but Cassie and Josh step in to host the event.
• Beth goes to Rick to convince him to attend the barbecue, emphasizing the importance of the tradition and the community.
• Alan falls in the park but insists on attending the barbecue, while Lizzie remains secretive about where she disappeared to earlier.
• Bill and Ava attend the barbecue together, but their relationship is strained due to Ava's recent actions and Bill's feelings for Lizzie.

1. * Cassie and Jeffrey are planning to attend a party and awards ceremony, but Cassie is also hosting a kids' party for her son RJ on the same night.
2. * Dinah is trying to get Edmund to turn himself in for kidnapping her, but he is resistant. Jonathan sets up a situation to make Tammy think Sandy is cheating on her, causing a rift in their relationship.
3. * Reva and Olivia suspect that Jonathan's adoptive father, Alfred, is the "Nate" who has been causing problems for them and their families. They want to take matters into their own hands and avoid involving the police.
4. * Bill, Dinah's brother, is trying to organize a family photo session to cheer up Olivia, who is grieving the loss of her sister. He wants Dinah to be a part of the photo.
5. * Cassie and Jeffrey decide to compromise and Jeffrey will attend RJ's party and then go to Cassie's place for cake and ice cream.
6. * Tammy and Sandy's relationship is strained due to Jonathan's actions. Reva asks Nate for her job back at the bar, and he agrees.

1. * Alan Spaulding confesses to shooting his son Phillip, but denies any wrongdoing and tries to blame Harley. However, his family, including his daughter Lizzie, confronts him with the truth, and he is eventually arrested for the murder.
2. * Dinah reveals to Edmund that she lost the baby, and tries to convince him to start a family with her instead of Cassie. Edmund is still in love with Cassie, but Dinah is desperate to hold on to him.
3. * Cassie and Edmund discuss their past mistakes and try to start over, but Cassie realizes that they can't get back what they had. She wants to co-parent their child peacefully, but Edmund still has feelings for her.
4. * Jonathan and Dinah commiserate over their lost loves, and Jonathan advises Dinah to fill the void with anything she can get. Dinah realizes that she needs to protect herself by hurting others before they hurt her.
5. * Tammy confronts Jonathan about hurting Sandy, and Jonathan implies that he has feelings for her. Tammy is determined to get Sandy back, and warns Jonathan not to hurt her.

• Shayne is enjoying his newfound fame as a professional baseball player, but is grateful for the normalcy he experiences with his friends from Springfield.
• Buzz surprises Shayne with a special sandwich in his honor, which Shayne appreciates as a reminder of his roots.
• Lizzie points out how Shayne's newfound fame will attract female attention, including potentially inappropriate requests for autographs.
• Cassie is throwing Jeffrey out of the hotel for his negative comments about Tammy's relationship with a juvenile delinquent.
• Ben is desperate to see his dying grandmother and is willing to sign anything to be released from the hospital.
• Mel is concerned for Ben's safety, as there is a killer on the loose who has already targeted him once.
• Gus and Eden argue on a rooftop, where Gus accuses Eden of being involved in the recent murders.
• Edmund asks Alexandra for help in fulfilling a dream of Cassie's, but Alexandra is more interested in getting Edmund's help in going after Jeffrey.
• Cassie overhears Edmund discussing a surprise with Alexandra, and is suspicious of their behavior.
• Gus suspects that Ben may be faking his memory loss in order to protect himself or someone else.

* Cyrus Foley is trying to rob the Spaulding's charity event, and Marina is on police detail at the event. Cyrus tries to get Marina to figure out how he's going to take Alex's money, while also hitting on her.
* Dinah and Matt have a complicated history, and Dinah has been fighting her feelings for him. However, after a kiss, she decides she doesn't want to miss out on something great and tells Matt she loves him. Meanwhile, Mallet has been stealing money from the evidence room to pay for Dinah's medical bills and is caught by his boss, Frank.

1. * Shayne is missing and Reva is worried about him. Josh and Jeffrey are trying to help her find him.
2. * Beth is torn about her relationship with Coop, Buzz warns her that she is going to break Coop's heart and Alan is trying to convince her to go to China with him and the kids.
3. * Lizzie is not going to leave Bill and go to China with her family, she wants to stay and help Bill clear his name.
4. * Coop has written a novel for his composition class about an affair between a younger man and an older woman.
5. * Shayne has been found and is safe, his injuries may be compounded by his prior car accident.
6. * Beth tells Alan she can't go to China because she has a law workshop in Minneapolis.
7. * Lizzie wants Bill to follow the lead he found and prove his innocence, Bill has bought her a pair of earrings for Christmas.

• Rae confronts Asa about his plan to run away with Roxanne Holden, and threatens to expose his crimes in her book.
• Max apologizes to Roxy and expresses his desire to give their marriage a chance, but Roxy receives a call from Rae warning her about Max's past deceit.

• Antonio confronts Elizabeth about her plan to take the baby and leave town, and she avoids the topic to check on Keri.
• Max informs Renee that his plan with Asa has fallen through and that Asa did not sign the divorce papers.

• Blair and Todd discuss their past mistakes and the possibility of change, with Blair expressing her forgiveness for Todd's past actions.
• In a preview for the next episode, a judge questions Todd and Blair about their desire for a divorce, while Natalie reveals her plan to sleep with Mitch Laurence to protect Antonio and the baby.

• The text describes a scene at a church where a christening is taking place. Jessica is getting her daughter Chloe baptized and has asked her sister Natalie to be the godmother. Jared is also present and is going to be a godfather.

• During the ceremony, the priest asks Natalie and Jared if they renounce Satan and all of his evil works, to which they agree. After the ceremony, Jessica gives Chloe to Natalie and they all take pictures together.

• Todd Manning is in the hospital after being attacked by Cole Thornhart. Dani, Todd's daughter, is relieved that he didn't die because it would have ruined Cole's life.

• Natalie is grateful to Brody for believing in her innocence when she was accused of pushing Marty Saybrooke down the stairs. Brody is taking Jessica to the prom, and Natalie is helping him pick out a corsage.

• Blair overhears Téa having a panic attack in her office and discovers that Téa is dying. Blair is shocked and upset by the news.

• Marty is attacked by three men while on her way to Cherryvale but manages to defend herself.
• John suspects Miles may have had something to do with Marty's attack due to a series of coincidences.

• Nora is surprised to find Clint at home instead of staying over at Dorian's as planned. Clint explains that Dorian decided to bunk in with David Vickers and Viki.

• Marcie and Michael discuss their future plans for their family. Marcie wants to wait a little longer before having another child.

1. * Viki is at the last place Natalie was seen before she disappeared, trying to find clues to her daughter's whereabouts. She confronts Marcie, who wrote a book that the serial killer has been using as inspiration for his murders. Viki is angry and frustrated, and she tells Marcie that she doesn't have the energy to make her feel better.
2. * Nora is worried that she may have contracted H.I.V. from Daniel, and she is waiting to get the test results. Bo is supportive and tells her that she is doing the right thing by getting tested. Nora is skeptical and says that she doesn't trust anything anymore.

Antonio is relieved to hear that she is safe, but Viki is worried and wants to know the truth about her daughter's whereabouts. Todd refuses to tell her, and Bo is focused on finding Natalie, so Viki is left in the dark.

• Tess and Nash are having a conversation about their dreams and aspirations. Tess reveals that she wants to stay in her new life and be free from her old one.

• Marcie and Rex are trying to escape from Hayes Barber. Hayes has them tied up and is planning to kill them.

• Starr and Blair continue their shopping trip and have a heart-to-heart conversation about their family and their lives.

1. Antonio Vega and Keri Reynolds are granted joint custody of their daughter Jamie after a court hearing.
2. Al Holden, a.k.a. the Voice of the Night, is in the hospital and needs a liver transplant to survive.
3. Todd Manning surprises Blair Cramer with a piano performance and a dance.
4. David Vickers confesses his love for Dorian Lord to Kelly Cramer.

• Rex is found in the women's steam room by Kelly, but he claims it's not what it looks like. Kelly gets stuck in the steam room and Rex helps her out.
• Gigi is upset with Rex for implying to his ex-wife that they are not having sex. Adriana mentions this to Gigi, causing a confrontation.
• Ford and James have to deal with their father Eddie, who has just been released from jail and is staying with them. They try to figure out how to get rid of him.

• Starr and Cole say their goodbyes as he is being taken to prison. Cole asks Markko to take care of Starr.

• Langston and Markko say their goodbyes as he returns to UCLA. Markko gives Langston a key to his house as a reminder of their friendship.

• Whitney, Chad, and Liz discuss a singing opportunity for Whitney at the Blue Note.

- Whitney agrees to take the job despite her mother's potential disapproval.
- Theresa tries to report Rebecca's abuse of Little Ethan to child protective services, but they don't believe her.
- Rebecca plans to evict Pilar and her family from their home using Ethan as an instrument to carry out her plan.
- Ethan struggles with the decision to evict the Lopez-Fitzgerald family but ultimately gives them the eviction notice.
- Rebecca is pleased with Ethan's actions and gloats about her plan to take Little Ethan away from Theresa.
- Miguel finds comfort in Kay's presence during a difficult time, strengthening their relationship.
- Tabitha notices the growing bond between Miguel and Kay and predicts that Kay will become Miguel's bride.
- T.C. suspects Chad of being the cause of Whitney's emotional upheaval and believes that he let Whitney down.

• T.C. is proud of his daughter Eve, who is a doctor. He calls her at the hospital to tell her that he has brought home Whitney's latest tennis trophy. However, Eve is not able to come home because she is taking care of a friend, Sheridan, who was injured in a fire.
• There has been a fire at the home of Sheridan and Antonio. Sheridan is injured and in the hospital, and Antonio is worried about her. Luis and Hank, who were also at the house, are trying to find out who set the fire.
• Liz, a friend of T.C. and Eve, is upset because she has revealed that her father molested her when she was a child. She is grateful for T.C.'s friendship and support.

* The Crane family is in crisis as T.C. and Julian blame Eve for Whitney giving up their grandchild for adoption. Eve tries to defend herself, but the tension between the family members escalates.
* Meanwhile, Sheridan and Luis suspect that Marty might be Sheridan's son, and they want to perform a DNA test to confirm it. However, Beth, Marty's adoptive mother, refuses to allow it, causing further tension and suspicion.

1. Whitney and Chad's trip to LA: Whitney is confused about why her mother, who was previously against her going to LA with Chad, has now changed her mind. T.C., Whitney's father, is also against this decision and is having a fight with Eve about it. Julian tries to comfort Eve and tells her that she did the right thing in encouraging Whitney to go to LA with Chad to protect her from Liz.
2. Sheridan's disappearance: The search for Sheridan has been officially called off, and Antonio believes that she is probably at a spa in Paris. However, Beth thinks that Sheridan is going to die and that her plan to be with Luis is back on track. Meanwhile, Sheridan is being held captive in Beth's basement.
3. Tabitha's pregnancy: Tabitha is pregnant, and Ivy suspects that she doesn't know who the father is. Tabitha is keeping the baby in a secret room in her house, and Charity accidentally discovers it. Tabitha tries to keep Charity away from the baby, but Charity senses that something is wrong with the baby.

• Spike, Noah, Sam, Paloma, Simone, and Jessica are having an intervention for Jessica regarding her abusive relationship with Spike.
• Endora, Maria, Fox, Tabitha, and Miguel are discussing Maria staying up past her bedtime and Endora sneaking chocolate.
• Fancy and Chris are discussing a video of Fancy and Luis that upset Sheridan.
• Gwen, Ethan, Jared, and Theresa are at a hotel for romantic evenings, but are interrupted by noises coming from outside their rooms.
• Kay, Miguel, and Tabitha are discussing Kay's relationship with Fox and Miguel's feelings for Kay.

• Kay and Miguel are excited to get married and raise Kay's daughter, Maria, together.
• Fox, who also has feelings for Kay, is upset about the engagement and struggles with the idea of losing her.
• Rebecca, Gwen's mother, is trying to help Gwen by taking care of Ethan, Gwen's husband, while Gwen is gone.
• Gwen and Theresa are both trying to win over J.T. so that he will reveal information that will help them in their respective fights for Ethan's love.
• Luis, Fancy's boyfriend, is searching for her after she goes missing. He becomes suspicious of Chris, Fancy's ex-boyfriend, when he finds him in a cave with a rope and flashlight.
• Fox finds out that he is dying and decides to keep it a secret from Kay so that she can be happy on their wedding day.
• Gwen wins a bet with Theresa and gets to be with Ethan, while Theresa is left feeling defeated.

1. * Karen suggests decreasing a patient's medication and plans to reassess in 12 hours
2. * Kevin confides in Karen about his drug addiction and she offers to help him find treatment
3. * Ian, a vampire, struggles with his desire to feed on Lucy and Chris helps him get the blood he needs
4. * Elizabeth asks Lucy for help finding Alison, who has been kidnapped by Joshua
5. * Alison confronts Joshua about his obsession with her family and he reveals his past friendship with her father.

- Daisy has escaped from prison and taken Jana's car. Daniel goes to look for her and is found unconscious with a head injury and hypothermia.

- Phyllis is worried about Daniel and blames herself for Daisy's escape.
