1. * Victor Newman is in a legal battle with his daughters, Victoria and Abby, over the control of Newman Enterprises.
2. * A forensic accounting report found no evidence of malfeasance or misuse of funds in Newman's books.

• Lily, Cane, and Tyler are discussing a work presentation when they get stuck in an elevator. Lily helps Tyler manage his claustrophobia by telling him stories and making up games.

• Jamie accuses Fenmore of pushing him off a roof, leading to a confrontation between Jamie, Fenmore, Michael, and Lauren. Jamie insists on pressing charges, while Michael and Lauren struggle to understand what happened.

• Nick has arranged for Newman Enterprises to buy Jabot's debt with the intention of foreclosing and making Victor proud.
• Victor is unaware of Nick's actions and is surprised when Jack informs him of the situation.
• Jack calls an emergency meeting of the shareholders to discuss the crisis and proposes selling 51% of Jabot to Chancellor Industries.
• Malcolm and Dru have a heated argument about Malcolm's insistence on taking a paternity test for Lily.
• Devon is upset with Lily for forgetting his birthday and expresses his frustration.
• Mac and J.T. discuss their dates with Kevin and Mac's desire to help him.
• Victor and Nick have a heated argument about the Jabot situation, with Victor accusing Nick of betraying him.
• Nikki calls Victor and the bankers involved in the Jabot deal, but he does not answer.
• Jack proposes selling 51% of Jabot to Chancellor Industries to prevent Victor from taking over the company.

1. Jack and Sharon are packing up boxes from the Abbott mansion, as Jack has been forced to split the furnishings with Gloria due to the court's decision. Gloria wants to have a big party to celebrate her new ownership of the mansion, but Kevin and Jana are unable to attend.
2. Victoria and Adam are in disagreement over the choice of spokesperson for Beauty of Nature. Victoria thinks the spokesperson is too young, while Adam believes she is a perfect fit due to her environmentalist activities and teenage fanbase.
3. Michael and Lauren refuse to visit the Abbott mansion due to Gloria's actions, while Kevin is determined to cut the strings and be independent of his mother.
4. Victor is visiting an art exhibition with Sabrina, expressing his admiration for certain pieces and artists. Sabrina admires Victor's strength and toughness, which he finds amusing.

• Detective Chance informs the Newman family that the body found in the Athletic Club basement is Adam's.
• The family will be contacted to make arrangements once the medical examiner releases the body.
• The investigation is being treated as a homicide, and a search warrant is issued for the Newman ranch and surrounding estate.
• Phyllis finds blood on Nick's jacket and suspects it may be Adam's.
• Patty reveals to Jack that she is pregnant with his child.
• Lauren is kidnapped and held captive by Ryder, who is revealed to be Sheila's son.
• Victor's watch, with Adam's blood on it, is found in the trash.
• Abby meets Ryder and they plan to meet again, unaware of his connection to her family.

• Genevieve and Jack are getting married in Las Vegas, but Genevieve is making her own arrangements to meet Jack there due to her wedding preparations.
• Victor hired Chelsea to seduce Billy and get incriminating photos, but she got pregnant instead. Victor fires her and tells her to leave town, but she refuses to go before the hearing about the baby.
• Michael and Lauren are in Toronto visiting their son Fenmore, and Michael wants to bring him back home. Lauren is hesitant because Daisy, who is around, is vicious and unpredictable.
• Chelsea feels guilty for seducing Billy and getting him sent to prison, but she is happy that she is giving her baby to Billy and Victoria to raise. Adam knows that Victor is behind the whole thing and is disappointed in his father.

<summary>

* Genevieve and Victor discuss the purchase of Beauty of Nature. Victor is concerned about the S.E.C. investigating the sale and wants to keep it out of the papers.
* Lauren and Jill confront Daisy at the Fenmore department store. Daisy has a permit for the gun, but Lauren is arrested for assault with a deadly weapon after pointing it at Daisy.
* Michael is busy with the Abbott adoption papers and the S.E.C. call regarding Victor's purchase of Beauty of Nature. Avery offers to help him, and they leave for the police station after hearing about Lauren's arrest.
* Nick and Phyllis discuss Daisy's visit and her claim that Lauren pulled a gun on her. Phyllis is emotional about Lucy being with Daisy and fears losing her mind if she sees Daisy.
* Neil confronts Harmony about their relationship and her absence from Devon's celebration. Harmony is frustrated with Neil for being too involved in her life.
* Tucker and Genevieve discuss a business proposition where Tucker would lie to the feds about loaning Genevieve the money to purchase Beauty of Nature in exchange for a percentage of the sale.
* Victor calls Michael to ask if he made the S.E.C. call, reminding him to do it as he asked to ensure the sale of Beauty of Nature goes through.

• Jack, Amber, Sharon, and Phyllis are all at the office discussing various things, including an anniversary gift for Nick and Phyllis.
• Victor, Victoria, and Adam are discussing a potential acquisition for Newman Enterprises, but Victoria is skeptical about the benefits of the company.
• Cane and Lily are discussing her return to work and her recent loss.
• Gloria is looking for Jeffrey, who has checked out of their hotel room without telling her.
• Kay, Jill, and Alistair are discussing Jeffrey and Gloria's relationship, as well as Kay's past relationships.

- Daniel, feeling guilty about the car accident that left Cassie in critical condition, contemplates leaving Genoa City. Lily tries to convince him that he is not a screw-up and that she believes in him.
- Michael plans a special evening for Lauren, giving her a necklace designed by Eric Forrester as a gift. Lauren agrees to go out with him, but mentions that they still have things to discuss.

• Sharon and Nick discuss the upcoming anniversary of Cassie's death and how it affects them. Sharon also mentions that she has been feeling numb and distant from her emotions due to her medication.
 • Phyllis calls Nick to come to the penthouse because Summer and her friends have been drinking and fighting there. Nick takes away Summer's car keys and has a heated conversation with Kyle about his relationship with Summer.
 • Michael and Lauren discuss their marital problems, which are exacerbated by Michael's jealousy over Lauren's relationship with Carmine.
 • Abby confronts Carmine about his fight with a jealous husband and realizes that he has been seeing Lauren. Abby warns Carmine to stay away from Lauren.
 • Jack and Traci discuss Phyllis's decision to move out and Jack's addiction recovery. Traci expresses her concern about Phyllis's motives and Jack defends her.
 • Kyle tells Jack that he has feelings for Summer, but Jack advises him not to pursue a relationship with her due to Nick's disapproval.

• Chelsea and Chloe's therapist have not heard from Chloe, who skipped her therapy appointment and is in violation of her probation. 
• Kevin asks Michael not to report Chloe's violation to Paul, giving him time to find her and take her to Fairview for help. 
• Ian Ward has been released from charges and is celebrating with Nikki, who is upset that he is not being punished for his actions. 
• Avery is filming a cooking web series and is interrupted by Dylan, who informs her that Ian has been released from charges. 
• Chloe and Kevin watch a movie, and Chloe expresses her guilt about enjoying life before Delia's death. 
• Ian approaches Nikki and Victor, who tell him to stay away from their family. Ian claims he is willing to forgive Nikki for trying to send him to prison. 
• Victor tells Nikki that he will handle Ian his own way, despite Nikki's pleas for him not to.

1. Nick is talking to his deceased daughter, Cassie, expressing his regrets and wishing he could take back certain actions he took in the past. He feels responsible for her death and the negative impact it had on his family and others.
2. Nick and Cassie discuss how things could have been different if he had made different choices. Cassie reminds him that no one is to blame for her death but the person who caused the accident, and that Nick should not blame himself or hold on to guilt.
3. Nick expresses his love for his family and his desire to be with them, and Cassie reassures him that she will always be with him, even if not physically. The scene ends with Nick deciding to move back home to be with his son.
• Michael and Lauren discuss

* Devon paid off Elena's student loans without her knowledge, causing her to feel like he was disrespecting her independence and disregarding her feelings.
 * Kevin has been living with Chloe, who faked her death, and is in town to get her back from Adam, who has been holding her captive. Kevin has been spying on Adam and kidnapped Phyllis to trade for Chloe, but Phyllis escaped. Adam is suing Nick for custody of Christian, and Michael will help Nick fight the case.

• Kevin explains that he needs a fresh start and a new place to help him move on from the pain of his past.
• Esther expresses her concern about Bella and the fact that Kevin doesn't know anyone in Portland.
• Meanwhile, Sharon is offered her old job back at Chelsea 2.0 by Chelsea.
• Chelsea expresses her appreciation for Sharon's reliability and trustworthiness.
• Sharon declines the offer due to her busy schedule, but encourages Chelsea to keep moving forward.
• Michael and Kevin reminisce about the first time Kevin came to Genoa City and how much he has changed since then.
• Michael encourages Kevin to stay in Genoa City and rebuild his life there, but Kevin is determined to leave.

• Abby expresses her concern about Nikki's absence and Victor's expectations for the concert.
• Victor expresses his hope that the concert will bring the Newman family back together.
• Nick and Nikki are discussing Nikki's decision to perform at the concert despite her recent flare-up of multiple sclerosis.
• Nikki expresses her determination to prove herself to Victor and to pursue her passion for music.
• Nick expresses his concern for Nikki's health and his belief that she is still under Victor's influence.
• Michael and Kevin say their goodbyes as Kevin prepares to leave Genoa City with Bella.
• Kevin expresses his gratitude for Michael's support and encourages him to stay in touch.
• Chelsea and Kevin run into each other and Kevin explains his injuries as a result of falling off a cliff.
• Chelsea apologizes for her behavior at Chloe's funeral and expresses her happiness for Kevin and Bella.
• Kevin reveals that they are going to see Chloe, which causes Chelsea to become emotional.

1. * Sharon is dealing with the uncertainty of her husband Nicholas' paternity of a child and his potential relationship with Phyllis. Jack offers his support and encourages her to take control of her life.
2. * Colleen is receiving anonymous notes and phone calls that suggest her father, Brad, is hiding something. She struggles with whether to tell him about the investigation into his past by Paul and JT.
3. * Daniel and Kevin are in a difficult situation as they try to come up with $10,000 to pay off Alex, who is threatening to reveal their involvement in a crime. Kevin asks his mother, Gloria, for the money, but she demands to know why he needs it.

• Mariah wants to be with Tessa, who needs to leave town to find her sister Crystal.

1. John, a man who was recently released from prison, has been taken to the hospital after experiencing vision problems and a minor stroke. His family, including his wife Gloria, children Ashley and Jack, and ex-wife Kay, are at the hospital waiting for updates on his condition.
2. Lily, the daughter of Neil and Dru, has returned home after discovering that her husband Daniel had lied to her about something in their past. She is struggling to decide what to do next and is feeling overwhelmed by her parents' attempts to control her life.
3. Neil and Dru, Lily's parents, are having marital issues and are arguing about how to handle the situation with Lily. Neil wants to be more direct and honest with Lily, while Dru is more cautious and wants to avoid conflict.

1. Jack and Sharon discuss the negative article about Sharon in "Restless Style" magazine, with Sharon expressing her disapproval of doing a similar expose on Phyllis.
2. Cane and Chloe tell Jill about their surprise courthouse wedding, while Jill expresses her disappointment at not being invited.
3. Adam offers Brad a position as C.E.O. of Newman Enterprises, with Brad accepting the offer.
4. Nick, Victoria, and Phyllis discuss their concerns about Nikki, who has gone to Mexico following Victor's death.
5. Jill confronts Brad about a negative article about her in "Restless Style" magazine, suspecting that he leaked the information.
6. Victoria is fired from Newman Enterprises by Adam, who then reveals that he has hired Brad as the new C.E.O.

* Murphy, Jill, Lily, Cane, Kevin, and Billy gather to mark the anniversary of Katherine's passing.
 
  * Katherine left instructions for Murphy to deliver to the group, which involves writing letters and burning them to send their thoughts and feelings to her.
 
  * Neil has lost his sight due to an electrical accident and is frustrated with how people are treating him.
 
  * Victoria is supposed to attend the remembrance but has to attend her son Johnny's preschool orientation instead. Billy helps her "escape" from the hospital to make it to the orientation.
 
  * The group writes their letters and burns them, sharing some of what they wrote.
 
  * Neil struggles to write his letter and eventually rips it up, deciding to write a new one.
 
  * Victor and Nikki share a moment, with Nikki reflecting on how hard Katherine's death has been for her.
 
  * The group dances and celebrates Katherine's life.
 
  * Nikki steps away from the party and is approached by Stitch, who expresses concern for her well-being.
 
  * Jill has a realization about the music box and the journey Katherine sent her on, and she thanks Katherine for it.

- Jill has been cleared of any wrongdoing by the S.E.C. and is ready to take back control of Chancellor Industries with Cane's help. Meanwhile, Kay has mixed up the names of Cane and the father of Lily's baby, causing Esther to worry about her health.
- Michael agrees to take in Eden, River's daughter, after being appointed as her guardian. However, he is worried about her hippie lawyer who seems more interested in making a statement than winning the case. Eden agrees to stay with Michael and Lauren for her father's sake.

• Reed is visiting his father J.T. before the latter leaves for a new job in D.C. J.T. and Victoria discuss their past divorces and their impact on Reed.
